content: Chi Man PUN – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau Skip to content Chi Man PUN潘治文 Professor Personal Homepage: https://cmpun.github.io/ Academic Qualification Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong (2002) Research Research Interests Image Processing and Pattern Recognition; Multimedia Information Security, Forensic and Privacy; AI Security and Adversarial Machine Learning Contact Details Faculty of Science and Technology University of Macau, E11 Avenida da Universidade, Taipa, Macau, China Room: E11-4091 Telephone: (853) 8822-4369 Fax: (853) 8822-2426 Email: cmpun Page load link Go to Top
